meanings.sent1: The corneous material of the rhinoceros horn is very strong.
meanings.sent2: The deer's antlers were corneous and sharp.
meanings.sent3: The corneous texture of the fake unicorn horn made it look quite realistic.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a corneous quality, sharp and piercing.
meanings.sent5: The corneous shell of the beetle gleamed in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: The ancient warrior's helmet was crafted from corneous material.
meanings.sent2: The corneous comb of the rooster was beautifully patterned.
meanings.sent3: The corneous handle of the knife added a touch of elegance to the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: His corneous demeanor made him seem unapproachable.
meanings.sent5: The corneous sculpture captured the essence of strength and beauty.

meanings.sent1: The corneous growth on the tree trunk looked unusual.
meanings.sent2: The lizard's tail had a corneous texture to protect itself.
meanings.sent3: The corneous feeling of excitement bubbled up inside her.
meanings.sent4: His corneous attitude towards the situation surprised everyone.
meanings.sent5: The corneous spikes on the cactus were a natural defense mechanism.
